downloadTitle: Microsoft Azure Automation Graphical Authoring SDK
downloadDescription: The Microsoft Azure Automation Graphical Authoring SDK enables developers to create and edit Graphical Runbooks for use with the Azure Automation service.
detailsSection:
The Microsoft Azure Automation Graphical Authoring SDK exposes the programming model for developers to manipulate Graphical Runbook (.graphrunbook) files. It allows custom applications to:
  1. Create runbook files that can be imported into the Azure portal and are editable by the graphical editor.
  2. Consume runbook files exported from the Azure portal.
For more information, refer to the ReadMe file installed by the SDK.
systemRequirementsSection:
• RAM – minimum 1GB, recommended 2GB
  • Disk space minimum 50MB
  • CPU Dual Core or better
installInstructionSection: Download and run the MSI file.
